  • Classes in org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation.allocator used by org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation 
    Class and Description
    ShardsAllocators
    The ShardsAllocator class offers methods for allocating shard within a cluster.
  • Classes in org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation.allocator used by org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation.allocator 
    Class and Description
    BalancedShardsAllocator.Balancer
    A BalancedShardsAllocator.Balancer
    BalancedShardsAllocator.Operation
    An enum that donates the actual operation the BalancedShardsAllocator.WeightFunction is applied to.
    BalancedShardsAllocator.WeightFunction
    This class is the primary weight function used to create balanced over nodes and shards in the cluster.
    GatewayAllocator
    The gateway allocator allows for a pluggable control of the gateway to allocate unassigned shards.
    ShardsAllocator
    A ShardsAllocator is the main entry point for shard allocation on nodes in the cluster.
